user.title: Setup Cisco 9800 WLC
user.description:
Make sure RESTCONF is enabled on your WLC before proceeding.

Enter the connection details to your Cisco 9800 WLC. Also note entites come disabled by default.

 Due to High load else of scanning be careful.
